### Step 2: Apply the decision reason

The decision reason prefers the lottery with the more favorable maximum magnitude outcome weighted by its probability.

The decision reason compares the maximum magnitude outcomes weighted by their probabilities. Since 6000 (from Lottery A) is greater than 0 (from Lottery B), Lottery A has the more favorable maximum magnitude outcome.
